alert.note: Alert for Gilmer; Gordon; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gilmer, eastern Gordon and western Pickens Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sonoraville, or near Calhoun, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Jasper, Resaca, Talking Rock, Fairmount, Ranger, Sonoraville, Talona, Redbud, Audubon, Blaine, Talmadge, Oakman, Hinton and Roundtop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
